website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice for those looking for the output of a smoker without having to do the work that generally comes with owning one.
pros: Gets high marks for its ease of use
cons: Unlike some other grills, this model does not come with a built-in top rack or meat thermometer
Some customers note problems with temperature fluctuations

website_summaries.verdict: It lacks some of the bells and whistles of other grills, but this is a solid, albeit smaller, pellet grill at a great price.
pros: Very nice price for a quality smoker
Very simple to use once you get the hang of it
cons: There is a bit of a learning curve before you'll be able to consistently get excellent results
This option is on the smaller side and quite short

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for eight months and now it has no power. I contacted Traeger, followed their emailed tips and could not resolve issue. They said they could not help me if I couldn't diagnose problem. My experience with this product is I paid a great deal of money for it, it only worked for eight months and it cannot be fixed. I cannot recommend this product in any way shape or form.
customer_reviews.author: ron weber

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! This grill had to be monitored every 45 ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! This grill had to be monitored every 45 minutes to ensure the hoper was working correctly. Ours did not after the first two hours. It shut off. We then relit started it and the entire grill caught on fire. Melted the entire drum base. When we reached out to Traeger we were told that we should have called customer service and not restarted it. Directions never stated to check every 45 minutes. They did absolutely nothing to help us except to offer new parts under warranty. What a waste! Worst grill ever, still to kettle grill! Save the money! Thank goodness Amazon has excellent customer service and allowed us to refund this to them! Traeger stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Kirschner

customer_reviews.title: Traeger expects customers to do warranty work.
customer_reviews.text: The grill did not work upon arrival - the pellets would not ignite. I called Traeger and they sent a new control board which I installed and still no ignition. I called Traeger back and after over 45 minutes on the phone, some of which with a customer service supervisor, they sent 2 new fans and an auger motor. I told them I wasn't going to do their warranty work and I was advised they would arrange for a service tech to contact me to come to my residence and replace the parts. Never heard from a tech or Traeger. I have returned the unit and will buy a Camp Chef based on a co-workers recommendation
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Eddy

customer_reviews.title: dont recommend
customer_reviews.text: nothing but problems with this grill. hasn't worked right since I got it. they sent me a new control panel which I had to install myself. customer service sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son as a gift & had to return: never worked properly & quality is poor. Whatever happened to Made in USA Traeger Smokers?
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: thermostat doesn't work; temp goes way pass dial setting after an hour or so use. Product is unusable after owning less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was a piece of crap. Bought a Pit Boss and it worked like ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, didn’t work correctly, changed it for another one. For me, it was a piece of crap. Bought a Pit Boss and it worked like a charm first time around.
customer_reviews.author: David Ford

customer_reviews.title: Update blanket review...
customer_reviews.text: Decided to truely test our blanket. Outside temp 29 deg, wind chill 10 deg. Winds sustained at 21 mph with gusts to 33. Started by smoking a pork tenderloin for 2.5hrs. Held its temp around 155-160 deg. Then grilled at 350 deg for 30 min. Grill worked perfectly. See all pics. First pic is temp outside, next 2 are smoking then the last couple grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works like it should
customer_reviews.text: If your'e getting this grill to set and forget it not the case you have to keep monitoring so the temp doesn't go way up causing a ton and I mean a ton of smoke coming out.You also need to keep an eye make sure the fire doesn't die while smoking I've had the whole thing shut off a few times since using.iI really had high hopes for this grill and not sure if I got a bad grill or what I've gone thru the instructions on starting to a T and still have issues. When its working the way it should its awesome!! but its not like that 100% of the time
customer_reviews.author: Raul H.

customer_reviews.title: Did not seem like I used any excess pellets
customer_reviews.text: Highs in the teens for the last couple of weeks. Been smoking outside. Keeps the heat inside the smoker at a fairly constant degree. Did not seem like I used any excess pellets. If you want outdoor cooking year round, this is a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: jaw

customer_reviews.title: Upon unboxing it I found the bottom of hopper assembly bashed in an the cooking grate is bowed like a banana
customer_reviews.text: Finally received the grill today, that’s a whole other story. Upon unboxing it I found the bottom of hopper assembly bashed in an the cooking grate is bowed like a banana. Contacted amazon and was given 20% off but I guess I have to contact traeger for replacement parts. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrad

customer_reviews.title: This the single worst cooking grill that I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This the single worst cooking grill that I’ve ever owned! Never holds temp, catches fire, and can makes any seasoned cook look like a total jackass. I really thought it was me ,even kept the thing to try to learn this system . My conclusion it just doesn’t work! It takes a lot to make me write a review but a burnt brisket on the forth of July (temp got to 550 when set on 225) and some ribs that were just ruined today. TRAEGER YOU SUCK!!!
customer_reviews.author: george shannon

customer_reviews.title: at 60# just the right size to take along ... Traeger on the road is great.
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty...I bought this to take along on RV trips... very nice unit This is my second Traeger the serial number on my first Traeger is # 307 I bought in the early 90's... I recently replaced the controls which restored a new life to an old favorite... so I now have two GREAT Traeger grills life is sweet. I will say the quality of the old Traeger build is pretty impressive... not that the new is bad it is just that the old is better... love them both.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It sure smells nice and the U Tube videos are helping us
customer_reviews.text: We have wanted one of these grills for years and we finally splurged and bought it. Husband does BBQ sometimes and we thought we could throw the meat on the grill and let it smoke until we were ready for dinner. Wrong...Ya have to know what you're doing and through trial/error you'll get it. We are still in the 'trial' stage, but determined to get it right. It sure smells nice and the U Tube videos are helping us, too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I ordered this product because of all the bad reviews about the heating element and it not heating the meat evening. BUT so far so good. My husband has done several racks of ribs and tri tip it has all been amazing. The only reason for the 4 stars is because we left it in unattended for about an 1 hr and for some reason the pellets quit feeding and the ribs stopped essentially cooking and had to be cooked a tad longer, but they were still delicious. So you Have to watch the food and not leave unattended too long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am horrible at grilling
customer_reviews.text: I am horrible at grilling...I burn things and I dry out the meat. So far I have used this three times and everything comes out juicy and amazingly delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This has helped with the temperature swings I had been experiencing. I haven't had the pot go out since I added it almost 4 months ago. It is really easy to install and is made of a nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, don't forget to stir the pellets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we wanted. Size is also just right for the two of us or the six of us when the kids are all home. Only issue is that the pellets funnel into a hole so you have to stir them every couple of hours or you lose your fire. Learned this the hard way and lost our fire extending our cooking time by a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Doke

customer_reviews.title: Smoke all year!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made for my Traeger so far. Fit like a glove, and maintained temperatures in cold weather much better! Pellet use is down, I even use it on some cooler nights in the summer and it still works great
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Ships in original box
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a Christmas gift for my husband. He got home before I did today when it arrived and found it by the front door in the origanal box so he knew exactly what I got him for Christmas. I just think it would have been nice to put it in an amazon box to prevent ruining a surprise this time of year...
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: fast starting
customer_reviews.text: the grill is great with one exception, the paint on the front of the barrel is buckling and peeling . I have used the grill three times and the front panel is blistering and peeling. overall , with that one exception the grill is a very good and fast starting product and cooks great.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Its kind of expensive, but if you don't want to dick around making your own, its easy to install. It makes a huge difference in achievable temp and pellet usage.
customer_reviews.author: Great Dictator

customer_reviews.title: Best meat ever
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this. It's easy to use and everything we make tastes amazing. My only issue is that I didn't realize how small it actually is. I knew the barrel was smaller but didn't realize how short it is. We have it on top of a 6 inch pedestal so it's a normal height.
customer_reviews.author: MzSpencer

customer_reviews.title: OMG Awesome Grill
customer_reviews.text: We had for years the regular traeger and recently for our RV decided to get the little version. Awesome cooking so far. Very similar results, very reliable, excellent heat distribution. We also tried in in our offroad trailer running out of batteries / solar panel and a inverter.. since this traeger uses so little energy, it runs for hours no problem.
customer_reviews.author: bigalpdx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Put it together, seasoned and did a rack of baby back ribs in two hours, at 325. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: james gillgren

customer_reviews.title: Fire goes out too easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use this product three times now, and on each occasion the pellets have not been dropping into the auger properly. They get stuck on ledges inside the hopper and dont drop down into the square opening in the middle. So the fire goes out, even though the hopper is still about half full. Seems like a more sloped design would work better, and a low pellet sensor would also help. Not really Set and Forget...
customer_reviews.author: Moose5

customer_reviews.title: Keeps heat in really well
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota and have been using it over the winter and so far has worked well. Don't really use it until it drops below about 25 degrees. Only thing is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hurd

customer_reviews.title: pays for itself in pellet reduction
customer_reviews.text: I like to cook year around on my Traeger. A couple times on cold, windy nights the smoker would fault off on low temp while on the low heat selection . . . (Junior Elite model). Bought this jacket to help with heat retention. After installing the pellet consumption was decreased and I haven't had a low temp fault since.
customer_reviews.author: jim rothstein

customer_reviews.title: Would not go without it!!
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly helps with grilling in MN winter!! We grill all year long, with are grill blanket it is always ready and keeps temp.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Does not feed correctly regardless of pellet brand. I’ve purchased 4 different brands of pellets and all of them jam the feeder up. I have to stay right by the smoker to keep it going. I made sure to get traegor pellets and kept them dry but it still jams up
customer_reviews.author: person

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Erratic temp control and auto shutdowns right out of the box. RTD temperature probe said to be the culprit by phone support. Sent us a new probe and installed today. More of the same problems: bought this for my father in law for Father's Day back in June. Still have not cooked a meal on it!!! We have a full size Costco-purchased Treager with no problems. How do we get our money back on this Junior Elite POS?
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hansen

customer_reviews.title: I live in a cold climate so the grill was only good for few short months for getting hot enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: My grill finally works for searing steaks! I live in a cold climate so the grill was only good for few short months for getting hot enough to sear.. I'm loving this cover. I have just found out that traeger now makes a thicker metal grill so it works without the blanket..thanks traeger..
customer_reviews.author: Holly M. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our family of 5! We've served some great meals off this grill. Love the flavor from the wood pellets. Grill mats work great with grates, keeping smaller pieces of food from falling through. Easy to use and easy to clean. Like everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He has cooked steak, chicken and ribs so far! While it is on the small side, it cooks enough for his family of six. He is very very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parks

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: No I have a lone star 20 grill and this cover is to small they need to do much better on there sizing. I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: S. J. danielson

customer_reviews.title: I love the smoker
customer_reviews.text: I love the smoker, but it was damaged when I received it. It had a dent on the barrel, with a crease that I couldn't get pounded out. The bolts were broken off the lid, so I had to find some and put it together. I was disappointed, but for the money, and the time having to put it back into the box, that was all messed up, I will keep it. I got a cover for it, so I don't have to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Error message
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for two weeks, but now I'm having issues with an error message and the grill shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to use. Sturdy worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I’m 76 and love it. I had to have someone put it together it’s a heavy grill for me to lift ( the box area)but Easy to understand via the cookbook and grill instructions.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kauhl

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to its claims. Temperature ranges ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not live up to its claims. Temperature ranges between 80 and 540 degrees on every use. It requires constant watching to be there when the fire goes out or races out of control. It required restarting multiple time on every use.
customer_reviews.author: JStrafelda

customer_reviews.title: This is our second Traegar Grill and we absolutely love it. It gets hotter that our first one ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Traegar Grill and we absolutely love it. It gets hotter that our first one so we enjoy steaks on it now. Best grill we have ever owned. I would strongly recommend anyone looking at a grill/smoker combo to give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not arrive as shown, loose fitting
customer_reviews.text: The slot for the handle on my tailgater 20 is too big which leaves a lot of unprotected space. This oversized slot also makes the door flap loose and not as secure as it could be. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well did a brisket out in winter weather did ribs both turned out pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Blanket keeps internal temp. right on the money .
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for treagering outside .Keeps the internal temp right on the money and I can cook here in Nebr. its 15 degrees out. I would give it a 5 Star product and I would also recommed it to any one who Has a Treager.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Albers

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed by the Quality Control and hope the supplier or ...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to use this new grill. However the grill arrived with minor damage and the grate is substandard and needs replacement before I can use it. I’m disappointed by the Quality Control and hope the supplier or manufacturer can make it right
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good product - great results
customer_reviews.text: What I'd expected doing homework on Traegers and this one is just right for me. Delivered as promised. Competitive price. Only wish the Junior had a slightly larger pellet box. Couple of rounds of burgers and it runs out. Comes with the package I guess; wish Traeger would increase the size though in their design,
customer_reviews.author: wyowind

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is held on with strong steel hooks and has openings for the vents and the handle.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket fits perfectly on my Treager Grill, clips on and off in less than 30 seconds and lets me grill in the low Alaska winter temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Ernst  W. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but appears well made and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Quality materials and build. No issues operating the door. Performed well to the task in 30 weather.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sy

customer_reviews.title: A small issue, but overall great!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this smoker several times in the last couple weeks. And while we love it, we've had a lot of problems with it going out in the middle of cooking/smoking. I think we have narrowed the problem down to there being moisture where the pellets go. But still a bit annoying. As long as that issue is resolved, we LOVE it. And the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son-in-law and he loves it. Made a turkey on Thanksgiving 😊
customer_reviews.author: carol shimmel

customer_reviews.title: Only been using for two weeks but I love it. No problems thus far
customer_reviews.text: Only been using for two weeks but I love it. No problems thus far. I do wish it had a somewhat larger capacity hopper. Does and excellent job of smoking, baking, BBQ. I do wish it seared better. It is better in every other way than any of my other BBQ's.
customer_reviews.author: gary j niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cold Weather Addtion
customer_reviews.text: Using the Traeger in extreme cold has a affect on the heat and cooking. The blanket was purchased and put on. The heat stays constant and food cooks normally. Nice addition for cold weather climates.
customer_reviews.author: Lonewolf

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless for trying to cook anything
customer_reviews.text: Will not maintain temperature within 200 degrees of setting. Completely useless for trying to cook anything. Every time I contacted Traeger they would come up with something off the wall that never worked. Stay away from this product. I would send it back if I could.
customer_reviews.author: James F Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Job
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a few times. Seems to do its job well. Would but again.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: nice quality item
customer_reviews.text: Blanket fits the grill perfectly, nice quality item. Keeps the temperature more uniform on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect....... Wanted one for awhile now.... Keeps the heat where you want it; ON THE MEAT!!
customer_reviews.author: The Bear

customer_reviews.title: Easy Easy Easy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of use. I’ve always been intimidated by grilling be it fire or gas, but in this case just plugin & do it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as expected. Smoker still shut off when used in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Willette

customer_reviews.title: The whole thing caught fire
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ, ideally. Bought this because my friend had one and it made great food. I used ours less than two months and the pellet cooker caught fire! I took 3 gallons of water to put it out and resulted in damage that can not be fixed. Just glad I didn't walk inside before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pellet Grilling
customer_reviews.text: You must follow the instructions very carefully but if you do it works better than any grill on the market. You have to watch the pellets to make sure they don't run out or it won't work. If everything goes right then you will have the best bbq you ever had.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this smoker. Many good eats. The smoker works very well, and the cookbook adds some great tips on recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely no a new grill, but it works well
customer_reviews.text: The grill works fine, but it came slightly damaged. Parts were bent as if had been dropped and a bolt was missing. Luckily we were able to get one from another grill we had. Overall it does work well
customer_reviews.author: JenLoveLee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My dad approves! Smaller grill but does the job for him. Can smoke meat, heat up food, and bake on it! Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Lovett

customer_reviews.title: bought for my son for Christmas, by February it ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son for Christmas, by February it was already have problems. i thought this was supposed to be a top of the line product?
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pellet smoker... ever since I bought this I haven't used my gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: New Albany Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall For the Hype.
customer_reviews.text: Got the Traeger because everyone said it was the best but the I walk into Walmart and find the same set up but even better quality yesterday by Boss. Not to mention it was half the price of the Traeger. It works good but I feel dumb for spending so much just for the brand. If I could I'd return it and try the Boss smoker. It's crazy because it's the same color and shape but has a heavier lid and better wheels that I could see right off.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Had 3 legs without holes instead of 2, now we cannot attach the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Did a 9# prime rib on Christmas in frigid weather. It worked like a charm!!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend this smoker or the company at this point
customer_reviews.text: Never ran at or near the set temperatures. 225 degree temperature swings with the all too often loss of fire. I bought a highly rated bbq thermometer to confirm the temps. I have used the smoker for 15 plus cooks and it consistently won't maintain the set temperature within the accepted + or - 20 degrees. After contacting customer service three times, all giving me excuses why it was my fault, they sent me a new temperature controller, which took a week to be delivered. Installed the new controller and now it won't start? I can't recommend this smoker or the company at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: First grill I returned because it looked like it fell off a semi at 90mph, the second one worked great for about 3 weeks....then it caught on fire. Interested to see how the warranty will work out.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: and he is extremely pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband, and he is extremely pleased with it. I bought him the Tailgater smoker/grill for Christmas and never thought about buying this (because I never thought he would be grilling in the winter...silly me).
customer_reviews.author: Helene Bricault

customer_reviews.title: Treager junior elite
customer_reviews.text: So far not happy with this smoker. 1 1/2 hours in stops heating 50 dollar brisket had to stop and start unit 3 times very little smoke spews out unless it’s in smoke mode .
customer_reviews.author: kenny harte

customer_reviews.title: The grill made great food! But it stands 3 feet tall at ...
customer_reviews.text: The grill made great food! But it stands 3 feet tall at it's tallest point and barely fit 2 racks of ribs. No room for a second cooking rack and no tray on the side of the grill. For the money, you can get a much better grill somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: r@msuko

customer_reviews.title: what a great smoker. I have been using now for 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great smoker. I have been using now for 4 weeks and the food is wonderful. Very easy to use and what a flavor. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: John Blumenshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! My husband and I have made pizza, meat and even baked a pie on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hava W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill!
customer_reviews.text: Got grill for a great price. Have had for 3 months and love it! Packaging was good and no damage to grill. No problems with keeping temp. Just enough room to cook for 6 to 8 people!
customer_reviews.author: PAC74

customer_reviews.title: cleans easily, great product
customer_reviews.text: Start with a switch, cooks evenly, cleans easily, great product. Anyone want to buy my weber ?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Fronius

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: The Traeger pellet grill is great! Heats up much quicker than a charcoal grill and tastes better than gas. Smokes meats very well.
customer_reviews.author: Boatman Gunworks LLC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy Too small and difficult to work with I guess I made the wrong choice. Darn it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Smoker doesn't work.  Catches on fire.  Absolute garbage.  Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst purchase I've ever made, ever. Smoker doesn't work. Catches on fire. Absolute garbage. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money.. Buy a RECTEC
customer_reviews.text: I bought the junior elite for my parents Christmas and the thermostat never worked. I set the temperature at 275 degrees and it will fluctuate from 250 to 350! The return window is closed now. They called Traeger customer service but they wouldn’t help them. I’d recommend a RECTEC instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Model BAC346 does not fit model Pro 20
customer_reviews.text: Model BAC346 does not fit the model Pro 20 Traeger. Traeger website lists this for junior and 20 series models, however it does not fit the model Pro 20, I purchased the BAC344 for the Pro 22 model and it works (a little big but no issues using it even with front folding shelf installed).
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All these years cooking with gas or charcoal ?Didn't know what I was missing.Wow!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kent moon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked Rib-Eye, Red potatoes, and pork chops already. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare... DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product ZERO stars. It worked the first time, and has malfunctioned, burned meat, required constant supervision to make sure the temperature doesn't go out of control ever since. Traeger has helped by sending new parts twice... fine, EXCEPT THE SAME THING HAPPENS EVERY TIME. The temperature goes out of control. We want to return this and get our money back. My husband is a master griller. And this product has him ready to pull his hair out. Nothing put frustration, spending hours replacing parts, and wasting money on burnt meat. Traeger should have to pay us for all the meat that's been ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie D.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Design
customer_reviews.text: The inner foil like material melted to my grill and left spots on the grill that don’t come off.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill but front was dented
customer_reviews.text: Great fast shipping and I can’t wait to fire it up this weekend but it did have a dent in the front upon opening. Nothing that will stop me from using but a little disappointing. The box was in perfect shape so it must have been a quality control slip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small family
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect for 4 to 6 people. I had to.order the 'blanket' to keep the temperature more consistent when its cold.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Eaquinto

customer_reviews.title: First, it didn't work. Treager had to send ...
customer_reviews.text: First, it didn't work. Treager had to send me a new controller to replace myself. Then, I finally got to use it, and my meat came out with no trace of smoke flavor. It is basically an outdoor oven. I found some products online to add smoke. I'm going to try them this weekend. What a dissapointment this "smoker" has been.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M Zanotti

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill! Perfect for family of 2, but also able to fit to handle a crowd. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oodathunked

customer_reviews.title: Great in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This allowed me to smoke brisket in 30 degree weather. Very pleased with results!
customer_reviews.author: RufioBoy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!  Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Auger didn't work out the box. Traeger customer service sends an email to mess with wires. Screw that. Returned mine to amazon. Ask for a US-based agent when you get the rep in the PI. Makes for an easier transaction. Traeger is garbag
customer_reviews.author: john grenier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's exciting to cook restaurant tasting food so easily at home
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Helmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Love my Treager!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I've made, pulled pork, brisket, ribs, chicken, salmon, fresh trout, has been recieved with rave reviews. Amazing product! Use with internal temp gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Ray E Vieselmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: We BBQ in very cold weather. Blanket really helps with the temperature staying up!
customer_reviews.author: jbeck

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful when it works best meat I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful when it works best meat I've ever had. But I've had all the pellets in the hopper catch on fire twice , I've followed everything by the book clean it every use and it still seams to jam and the pellets start burning in the hopper and I use the brand name pellets . And every once in a while it will jump to 500 degrees on smoke and burn my meat .
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfit fit and looks good too. Keeps temperatures close during cold weather cooking. Hold up good to heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: The traeger showed up two legs shy of the 4 needed to hold it up. This is the second traeger I have sent back and my last one. No more traegers for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Thornton

customer_reviews.title: I have to say one of the best packing jobs I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I have to say one of the best packing jobs I have ever seen. Nice to know it shows up undamaged and easy to put together. Look forward to getting it fired up this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE - LOVE THIS GRILL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE - LOVE THIS GRILL... IT IS BIG ENOUGH TO FEED A FAMILY OF 4 PLUS MORE... NO NEED TO GO OUT AND BUY THE BIG ONE UNLESS YOU ARE COOKING FOR A PARTY OF 15 OR MORE. THE FOOD IS 10X BETTER THAN OUR NICE WEBER GRILL! WOULDN'T TRADE IT FOR ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Loann

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for better..
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I give it two stars because it did cook my food, eventually. That being said, I had to relight it 6 times during an 8 hour session smoking/grilling a brisket. It sucks going out to throw some mop sauce on your piece of meat just to find that the temp inside the grill is around 100°F... So, after that, I go out every 30 minutes to make sure it hasn't gone out again, which it did 5 more times. And let me tell you, the relight process is a pain, and if you don't do it correctly, expect even more issues... Honestly, I'd avoid this product and spend a little extra and get yourself a better one... Very dissatisfied...
customer_reviews.author: M
